title: Designates state route 23 as a state arterial highway in the city of Norwich, county of Chenango
summary: Designates state route 23 as a state arterial highway in the city of Norwich, county of Chenango.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3632

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CROUCH -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Transportation

       AN  ACT  to  amend the highway law, in relation to designating a certain
         highway in the city  of  Norwich,  county  of  Chenango,  as  a  state
         arterial highway

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. That part of section 349-e of the highway law which  desig-
    2  nates state arterial routes for the city of Norwich is amended by adding
    3  a new paragraph 3 to read as follows:
    4    3. BEGINNING AT THE INTERSECTION OF NORTH BROAD AND REXFORD STREETS IN
    5  THE  CITY  OF  NORWICH, THENCE EASTERLY ALONG REXFORD STREET TO THE CITY
    6  LIMIT; FROM THE INTERSECTION OF NORTH BROAD AND PLEASANT STREETS IN  THE
    7  CITY  OF  NORWICH,  THENCE  WESTERLY  ALONG  PLEASANT STREET TO PLYMOUTH
    8  STREET; AND FROM THE INTERSECTION OF PLEASANT AND  PLYMOUTH  STREETS  IN
    9  THE  CITY OF NORWICH, THENCE NORTHERLY ALONG PLYMOUTH STREET TO THE CITY
   10  LIMIT. APPROXIMATE LENGTH 1.51 MILES.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04880-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a certain highway in the city of Norwich, county of Chenango, as a state arterial highway
